metadata.Title: CVE-2015-0928 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
libhtp 0.5.15 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULLpointer dereference).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-0928` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

suricata - 2.0.8-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: suricata package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.8-1').
